## Summary

Join us every Friday for our engaging and productive working meetings focused on advancing the OpenProblems ecosystem.

## Agenda

The meeting starts takes place on Discord between 11:45 and 13:45 (UTC, GMT+0).

* **11:45-12:00 - Opening remarks**: Kick-off with an update on recent progress and developments within the OpenProblems project.

* **12:00-13:30 - Breakout Sessions**: Engage in targeted discussions and collaborative work in smaller groups. Breakout sessions are designed around specific topics, offering a space for deep dives into various aspects of the project.

* **13:30-13:45 - Closing remarks**: Wrap up the meeting with a summary of key takeaways and a look ahead at next steps and objectives for the coming week.

## Prepare for the meeting

You can prepare for the meeting by familiarizing yourself with our core materials:

* [**Fundamentals**](/documentation/fundamentals/): Get a solid understanding of our project's fundamentals.

* [**Create new components**](/documentation/create_component/): Learn about contributing new components to the ecosystem.

* [**Reference docs**](/documentation/reference/openproblems/): Review the structure of the project's framework.

## Stay connected

Be the first to hear about our latest updates and opportunities by joining our [mailing list](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe90Oky4-1b0HbdLsp5Yqo9juCd2mq-NlGHU9NHRW1ECok1xQ/viewform?usp=sf_link) to get the latest updates.
